title: i cant put less then 5 points on my masteries
body: hi, when i click on a masterie i can put only 5 points on it and i cant take out one whit the right click

replies.body:
You can add or remove individual points by hovering over the mastery and using the scroll wheel on your mouse to scroll up or down. Just tested this on the Beta Client. ^.^

If you have any other questions, let me know.
